However, the author might have been inconsistent by continuing after getting a girlfriend, then breaking off again. But he did stop when he felt bad. 

The people in the other sub said he led them on, but the author claims it was clear he's straight. The problem is that the friend might have hoped for more, even if the author didn't. The author tried to maintain friendship but the friend became distant.
